title: Okta Help
content:
← Back to Okta Sign-In Page Okta is an on-demand service that allows you to easily sign in to all the applications your organization uses through a single login. Once you sign in, your Okta home page displays all your applications in one location. Simply click the application's corresponding icon, and the application will open in a new browser window--passing your successful login into the application. (Note: if you’d like to bypass all clicking and have applications auto-launch upon sign-in, .) Frequently Asked Questions [TOC] 3 3 false none list false What should I do if I forget my password? Click Forgot Password on your organization's sign-in page. Choose an option to reset. If you have a working MFA on your phone, you should be able to reset with that or you can send email. This usually sends an email to your personal and work emails. [Image] I have a new device. How do I reset my MFA? See the documentation provided here: . How do I sign into Okta? Open a web browser and enter http:// simpli .okta.com. Then, enter your username (company email) and password and select Sign-in . Proceed with your authenticator of choice. How I report a security issue related to Okta? Send an email to digitalworkplace@simpli.fi & security@simpli.fi documenting what happened. Attach any notable screenshots that could be useful.
